put.description: Asynchronously creates a new storage task assignment sub-resource with the specified parameters. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create request is issued with different properties, the storage task assignment properties will be updated. If a storage task assignment is already created and a subsequent create or update request is issued with the exact same set of properties, the request will succeed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to create a Storage Task Assignment.

200.description: OK -- Update storage task assignment with the same properties specified in the request body.

201.description: OK -- Create storage task assignment with the same properties specified in the request body.

202.description: Accepted -- Create or update request accepted; operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to update a Storage Task Assignment.

200.description: OK -- returned when the update request body had no changes.

202.description: Accepted -- update request accepted; operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the storage task assignment properties

200.description: OK -- properties retrieved successfully for the storage task assignment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete the storage task assignment sub-resource

202.description: Accepted -- Delete request accepted; operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: NoContent -- specified storage task assignment does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the storage task assignments in an account

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: Optional, specifies the maximum number of storage task assignment Ids to be included in the list response.

200.description: OK -- list of storage task assignments was retrieved and returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Fetch the report summary of all the storage task assignments and instances in an account

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: Optional, specifies the maximum number of storage task assignment instances to be included in the list response.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Optional. When specified, it can be used to query using reporting properties. See [Constructing Filter Strings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/querying-tables-and-entities#constructing-filter-strings) for details.

200.description: OK -- storage task assignments' instances report summary retrieved and returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Fetch the report summary of a single storage task assignment's instances

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: Optional, specifies the maximum number of storage task assignment instances to be included in the list response.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Optional. When specified, it can be used to query using reporting properties. See [Constructing Filter Strings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/querying-tables-and-entities#constructing-filter-strings) for details.

200.description: OK -- storage task assignment's instances report summary retrieved and returned successfully

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: Properties of the storage task assignment.

taskId.description: Id of the corresponding storage task

enabled.description: Whether the storage task assignment is enabled or not

description.description: Text that describes the purpose of the storage task assignment

executionContext.description: The storage task assignment execution context

provisioningState.description: Represents the provisioning state of the storage task assignment.

runStatus.description: Run status of storage task assignment

StorageTaskAssignmentProperties.description: Properties of the storage task assignment.

target.description: Execution target of the storage task assignment

trigger.description: Execution trigger of the storage task assignment

StorageTaskAssignmentExecutionContext.description: Execution context of the storage task assignment.

prefix.description: Required list of object prefixes to be included for task execution

excludePrefix.description: List of object prefixes to be excluded from task execution. If there is a conflict between include and exclude prefixes, the exclude prefix will be the determining factor

ExecutionTarget.description: Target helps provide filter parameters for the objects in the storage account and forms the execution context for the storage task

type.description: The trigger type of the storage task assignment execution

parameters.description: The trigger parameters of the storage task assignment execution

ExecutionTrigger.description: Execution trigger for storage task assignment

startFrom.description: When to start task execution. This is a required field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

interval.description: Run interval of task execution. This is a required field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

intervalUnit.description: Run interval unit of task execution. This is a required field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

endBy.description: When to end task execution. This is a required field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

startOn.description: When to start task execution. This is an optional field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'

TriggerParameters.description: The trigger parameters update for the storage task assignment execution

prefix.description: The container prefix for the location of storage task assignment report

properties.description: Properties of the storage task assignment.

StorageTaskAssignmentUpdateParameters.description: Parameters of the storage task assignment update request

taskId.description: Id of the corresponding storage task

enabled.description: Whether the storage task assignment is enabled or not

description.description: Text that describes the purpose of the storage task assignment

executionContext.description: The storage task assignment execution context

provisioningState.description: Represents the provisioning state of the storage task assignment.

runStatus.description: Run status of storage task assignment

StorageTaskAssignmentUpdateProperties.description: Properties of the storage task update assignment.

target.description: Execution target of the storage task assignment

trigger.description: Execution trigger of the storage task assignment

StorageTaskAssignmentUpdateExecutionCont.description: Execution context of the storage task assignment update.

type.description: The trigger type of the storage task assignment execution

parameters.description: The trigger parameters of the storage task assignment execution

ExecutionTriggerUpdate.description: Execution trigger update for storage task assignment

startFrom.description: When to start task execution. This is a mutable field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

interval.description: Run interval of task execution. This is a mutable field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

intervalUnit.description: Run interval unit of task execution. This is a mutable field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

endBy.description: When to end task execution. This is a mutable field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'

startOn.description: When to start task execution. This is a mutable field when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'RunOnce'; this property should not be present when ExecutionTrigger.properties.type is 'OnSchedule'

TriggerParametersUpdate.description: The trigger parameters update for the storage task assignment execution

prefix.description: The prefix of the storage task assignment report

value.description: Gets the list of storage task assignments and their properties.

nextLink.description: Request URL that can be used to query next page of storage task assignments. Returned when total number of requested storage task assignments exceed maximum page size.

StorageTaskAssignmentsList.description: List of storage task assignments for the storage account

StorageTaskAssignmentName.name: storageTaskAssignmentName
StorageTaskAssignmentName.description: The name of the storage task assignment within the specified resource group. Storage task assignment names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
